data: The first time I was blessed with a sight of the señorita was on the day of my arrival in the Federal City,—in fact, it was upon my arrival.
The first time I was blessed with a sight of the señorita was on the day of my arrival in the Federal City,--in fact, it was upon my arrival.

A Volunteer with Pike
The True Narrative of One Dr. John Robinson and of His Love for the Fair Señorita Vallois
